'''Treasure Clue (I)''' is a quest item obtained during [[Kaeya]]'s [[Story Quest]] "[[Mystery of the Arcadian Ruins]]".

==Text==
Three six-armed giants reside<br />
In the city in the lake.<br />
Two guard the statue,<br />
One, the treasure.
